ì„œë²„ ê´€ë¦¬ ê°œíŒì…ë‹ˆë‹¤ ë­” ë†ˆì— ë™ê¸°í™” ì˜¤ë¥˜ í‰ì¼ ë‚®ì‹œê°„ì¸ë°ë„ ë¶ˆêµ¬í•˜ê³  4-5ë²ˆ ìƒê¸°ëƒêµ¬ ì§œì¦ë‚˜ì„œ ê²Œì„ ëª»í•˜ê² ë„¤ìš”

Don't waste your time with this game. Perk system is complete ass. Grind for hours to get bloodpoints just to dump 1000000 of them into a tree to not get the one perk you actually want. Perks shouldn't have a trash leveling system like they do. You should only have one tier of perks, I shouldnt have to find it 3 times over the course of MILLIONS of bloodpoints. And if that isn't bad enough. Lets just have an add on that lets you kill survivors after one hook and makes the game completely unplayable or fun. Yeah, if you're looking for a great game to make you depressed thats completely unenjoyable then this game is the game for you. Look no further. Devs don't care about the gameplay and would rather work on things that don't matter. Bugs in this game too, don't worry they will patch them after weeks even if they're completely game breaking, and thats a stretch of a timeline. Once those bugs are fixed they always manage to introduce new ones with every patch. It's a never ending cycle. Don't waste your time. Loved this game the first about 100 hours until I learned everything about it, only reason to play is with your friends.

Muy buen juego, no lo paran de mejorar
I like this game because it somehow still scares the bejeezus out of me every time I play.
It's fun with friends, but can also make you rage which kind of builds this competitive feel to the game. I usually play survivor, but I might dip into playing a killer eventually.

I have a few complains with this game. 
1.) Why is there a rank when you get no real rewards for it. I literally play the game til we get put in red rank and now every fucking match is killers going Thano, Pop, Ruin, and NOED. 
2.) I'll fast vault through a window or whatever and still get hit even though I made it through before their swing.
3.) Decisive Strike is so fucking weak now that there's no point even having it in the game. Along with the darkens the mist reagents and shit. 
4.) Honestly this game is stagnant and past its prime but Salty Streamers won't let any other new games like this one make it long enough for us to actually have fun with this sorta game again.

I'm gonna have to still say just get this game on sale and don't buy anything else in game.
